author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Tiruchi–Howrah-Tiruchi bi-weekly express (12664/12663) will be permanently augmented with one first AC coach with effect from February 9 from Tiruchi and with effect from February 11 from Howrah.

The Madurai–Hazrat Nizamuddin–Madurai Sampark Kranti bi-weekly express will be permanently augmented with one AC 3-tier coach with effect from February 7 from Madurai and with effect from February 9 from Hazrat Nizamuddin, a Southern Railway release here said.
title: Additional AC coaches
